Notes.Text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

* CVE-2018-14434: A memory leak for a colormap in WriteMPCImage incoders/mpc.c was fixed. (bsc#1102003)
* CVE-2018-14435: A memory leak in DecodeImage in coders/pcd.c was fixed. (bsc#1102007)
* CVE-2018-14436: A memory leak in ReadMIFFImage in coders/miff.c was fixed. (bsc#1102005)
* CVE-2018-14437: A memory leak in parse8BIM in coders/meta.c was fixed. (bsc#1102004)

Bug fix:

- bsc#1094741: Fix unexpected result with `convert -compose`.
Notes.Title: Details
